definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Soldiers in camouflage banged on the door, then shot at it, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，穿着迷彩服的士兵大聲捶門，然後朝門開槍。

sentences.english: And when the virgins were gathered together the second time, then Mordecai sat in the king's gate.
sentences.chinese: 第二次招聚處女的時候，末底改坐在朝門。

sentences.english: And all the king's servants, that were in the king's gate, bowed, and reverenced Haman: for the king had so commanded concerning him.
sentences.chinese: 在朝門的一切臣僕都跪拜哈曼，因爲王如此吩咐。

sentences.english: Then the king's servants, which were in the king's gate, said unto Mordecai, Why transgressest thou the king's commandment?
sentences.chinese: 在朝門的臣僕問末底改說，你爲何違背王的命令呢。

sentences.english: The guards, he remembered, and made a move toward the door.
sentences.chinese: 衛兵，他想起來了，於是朝門走了一步。

sentences.english: Julia rushed out of the hut, and scurried to the gates.
sentences.chinese: 茱莉亞跑出的小屋，朝門跑了出去。

sentences.english: Then he got up and walked towards the door.
sentences.chinese: 然後他站了起來，並且朝門的方向走去。
所有的人都朝門跑了過去。

sentences.english: Honey twisted her head sideways and looked towards the door.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂把頭轉向側面，朝門望去。

sentences.english: I found my purse and headed for the door.
sentences.chinese: 我找到我的手包，朝門走去。

sentences.english: At that point, his wife rose, and stepped to the door.
sentences.chinese: 在那個時候，他的妻子站起來，朝門走去。

sentences.english: He made for the door instantly he heard the knock.
sentences.chinese: 他一聽到敲門聲，就朝門走去。
